message.body: Ok so what can I talk to the boy about
That's not the party
We haven't talked all day
￼Wtf?!?! I literally want to stab his eyes out.
He's not allowed to call me nerd.
What?
Ugggghhhhh.
There's like nothing I can say to that either. He sucks.
what was that in response to?
He said he couldn't come to the party. I said k whatever. He says that bullshit and now I never speak to him again.
I hate him. But that was him trying to flirt I'm sure
I'm a disgusting human. I'm eating third north cheeseburgers bc feelings.
I like literally didn't even care two weeks ago wtf happened.
Ugh he's just an idiot he's irrelevant
And Alex is already at upenn so he won't last much longer
Also here's a pic of a thumb in Manhattan aka our broker to cheer you up￼
Lolololololol he looks like Stanley tucci
￼Here's a pic of thumb and his babe of a wife to give us hope
He has a son and a daughter
Wow thumbs can have lives
This is such good news
￼Thumb in paradise
￼The thumb before he was a thumb
Omg stop
How am I supposed to take this guy seriously now
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=seHZhL_iLDY THIS IS HIS DAUGHTER AT AGE 11 SINGING OH MY LORD
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fOiEFfaudbg age 14
Holy shit
She's magic
She's like the next Broadway star and her thumb father is going to help us nuggets find a house
She’s perfect
And her son was one of 13 or something to be accepted into the clive davis thing at nyu for juniors in high school so that’s probably why he wants to help us
his*
Omg I'll have be like yeah I work with Clive Davis kids it's super chill Lolololololol
I just watched him do the ice bucket challenge and he wasn’t wearing a shirt and I think I just crossed a line
aw dude why you gotta go and do that
this is why we can’t have nice realtors
I fucked up okay?
Okay apparently were not going today bc all three of us need to be there.
Ooooookeeey
Wait don’t surrender it yet though I emailed the other dude maybe we can do that instead.
His place will be available in July
Kk
So what's the situation?
Everyone is being sucky
I hate everyone
I really do too

Currently looking at an archive of all my old messages (you can do that, even the ones that got deleted) and apparently this happened to me: The fact that one of the cooks was like I need a date to a wedding Saturday and I didn't hear him and another guy was like Chloe what are you doing Saturday I was like uh idk probably nothing and he was like there ya go Brandon there's your date and I just laughed and kept walking then he just came up to me and goes so are you really gonna go with me Saturday? I was like uh he's like what? I'm like my boyfriend wouldn't like that he's like I look really good in a tux and free beer! I'm like I'm good
OMG what
... Taco Bell?
It’s really hilarious because I’m currently reading all the super gay shit jimmy used to say to me
And nope applebee’s
Hahahaha I love it how do I access it?
I’ll show you at home
Sweg
Currently reading Jimmy bitching and moaning about me not letting him pick me up at 9AM during the summer
Hahahaha and that's when trouble started
“they’ll be perfect for our kids:)” no stop
Ew

Reasons I was antisocial freshman year: I love you thank you baby I just need you to be home. They say like you need the basics like food, home, clothing and love and I just need that last one I haven't gotten to feel much compassion from anyone. Not that you've been lacking i just need like physical touch like a hug not just over a computer screen:(
Omg what is this.
Who is this.
Jimmy omg
Hahahahhahahahah im dying
I can’t with him
